Package de.unisiegen.tpml.core

Interface Summary
AbstractProofModel.UndoableTreeEdit The base interface for all undoable edit actions on the tree model.
ProofModel The interface defines a suitable data model for proving various properties about an expression.
ProofNode Base class for proof nodes that present the fundamental parts of the ProofModels.
ProofRule Base interface for proof rules in the small and big step interpreters and the type checker.
ProofRuleSet A set of ProofRules.
 

Class Summary
AbstractProofModel Abstract implementation of the ProofModel interface, which is used by prover implementations.
AbstractProofNode Abstract base class for proof nodes that present the fundamental parts of the common.AbstractProofModels.
AbstractProofRule Abstract base class for classes implementing the ProofRule interface.
AbstractProofRuleSet Abstract base class for classes implementing the ProofRuleSet interface.
Messages TODO Add documentation here.
ProofStep A proof step represents an application of a ProofRule to an Expression.
 

Exception Summary
CannotRedoException This exception is thrown whenever the users tries to invoke the ProofModel.redo() method, but the change cannot be redone or the redo history is empty.
CannotUndoException This exception is thrown whenever the user tries to invoke the ProofModel.undo() method on a proof model, but the change cannot be undo or the undo history is empty.
ProofGuessException This exception is thrown when an attempt to guess the next proof rule for a given proof node failed.
ProofRuleException This exception is thrown when an attempt to apply a rule that cannot be applied to a node.
